titleStmt.title: A general epistle to all Friends.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 7: G.F. [i.e. George Fox].
First line of text: All my dear Freinds [sic], and brethren who are of the royal seed.
Imperfect: lacking all after p. 7. Catchword on p. 7 "And".
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
